risk_text: Misclassification causes full rework of environmental path and schedule.
drivers: Ambiguous thresholds; incomplete footprint; mixed configuration

risk_text: Late discovery of Natura/forest/archaeology constraints triggers new steps and delay.
drivers: Poor early GIS; land status uncertainty; insufficient desk study

risk_text: EIA dossier incomplete -> repeated requests and timeline extension.
drivers: Weak baseline studies; inconsistent maps; missing annexes

risk_text: Consultees delay or escalate conditions, extending AEPO timeline.
Grid studies reveal reinforcement needs -> long delay and higher capex.
drivers: Network saturation; upgrade dependency; iterative requests

risk_text: Testing/energization fails due to protection/telemetry non-conformance.
Missing publication evidence breaks audit/financing covenant readiness.
